summary: "The Big Bang Theory" was a popular American TV show about smart but socially awkward scientists and their friends. It ran from 2007 to 2019, with 12 seasons. The main characters lived in Pasadena, California, and worked at Caltech. Over time, more characters joined the main cast. The show was filmed in front of a live audience and won many awards, including Emmys and a Golden Globe. It also led to a prequel series, "Young Sheldon," and a upcoming sequel series.
title: The Big Bang Theory
